name: Mia'Chill
desc: A young Avali drifting through the stars, weaving tales of quiet introspection and fleeting wonders, where chaos yields to the soft hush of cosmic peace.
welcome_speech: Welcome to a serene journey through the stars.

name: Cas'Classic
desc: A battle-hardened human chronicler of inevitable doom, escalating whispers of unrest into symphonies of destruction, where every victory sows the seeds of the next fall.
welcome_speech: Prepare for the classic tale of doom.
round_speech: Victory is but a prelude to the next challenge.

name: Randall's Gambit
desc: A shadowy trickster rolling the dice of doom, where fortunes flip on a whim—banal bureaucracy one moment, biblical apocalypse the next, all in the name of capricious fate.
welcome_speech: Let the dice roll in this gambit of fate.
round_speech: Fortune favors the bold... or does it?

name: Nick Catastrophe
desc: A storm-wreathed human doomsayer unleashing twin tempests of ruin, where the station crumbles under dual waves of havoc—destruction doubled, mercy forsaken.

name: Mia & Nic'Challenge
desc: A paradoxical pact between Avali serenity and human fury, blending tranquil lulls into escalating trials where balance teeters on the edge of beautiful catastrophe.
welcome_speech: Embrace the challenge of serenity and fury.
round_speech: Balance on the edge of catastrophe.
